import React from 'react'; import './Signin.css'; const Singnin=({onRouteChange , onSessionChange,onStateChange})=>{ return(
Sign In
onStateChange('home','normal')} className="white sat b ph3 pv2 input-reset ba b--white bg-transparent grow pointer f6 dib" type="submit" value="Sign in" />

onRouteChange('registrer')} className="tc f6 link dim white db pointer">Register

onStateChange('home','admin')} className="tc f6 link dim white db pointer">Sign in as Admin

) } export default Singnin;
